channel.title: Fakescape based server shuts down
channel.description:
My Fakescape based server shuts itself down about every 20 minutes, sometimes more often, and it'll get errors, which change depending on the time.
How can I fix this? Can somebody help me? I have msn messenger, and gmail chat. I can also talk in-game.
I have set up a scheduled task that runs every 20 minutes to end the server, and restart it, but it doesn't work so well, on times when the server stops working in like 2 minutes.
Thanks for your help!

item.title: Fakescape based server shuts down
